name: df-wspthsn
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cwwspthsn, cmpo(s0, s1, cn0, universe, crab(s2, co(cv(s0), cwwlksn, cv(s1)), wex(s3, wbr(cv(s3), cfv(cspths, cv(s1)), cv(s2))))))
comment: Define the collection of simple paths of a fixed length as word over the set of vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Mar-2018.) (Revised by AV, 11-May-2021.)
